name: MadGun: Gears and Blood
description:
A simple, singleplayer platforming game created in SFML and C++, for Games Engineering coursework.

Help MadGun navigate through each level and reach the end exit, but look out! There are other robots and turrets that will stop you!

Will you be able to clear all 5 levels?

Good luck!

Will require a Windows 10 PC to run. Game Supports Xbox One and Steam controller.

Controls

Keyboard

  • Move left/right - left/right arrow keys
  • Jump - Up arrow key
  • Return to main menu - Escape key
  • Move menu selection up/down - Up/Down arrow keys
  • Confirm selection - Enter key

Xbox/ Steam Controller

  • Move left/right - left/right on the left analogue stick
  • Jump -A button
  • Return to main menu - Start button
  • Move menu selection up/down - Up/Down  on the left analogue stick
  • Confirm selection - A button
